Module: jQuery

jQuery

The jQuery plugin namespace. a set of standard mini jquery plugins and extensions This set of extensions adds functionality to the jQuery.fn external library

Methods

<static> containsI()

allows the query of elements containing case-insensitive text works just like $(':contains(text)') but as $(':containsI(text)') Additionally, allows regex searches:
Source:
  • all.js, line 558
Returns:
selection of elements containing string (insensitively)
Example
 $("p:containsI('\\bup\\b')") (Matches "Up" or "up", but not "upper", "wakeup", etc.)
 $("p:containsCI('(?:Red|Blue) state')") (Matches "red state" or "blue state", but not "up state", etc.)
 $("p:containsCI('^\\s*Stocks?')") (Matches "stock" or "stocks", but only at the start of the paragraph (ignoring any leading whitespace).)

<static> formToObject() → {object}

convert a form's name/value pairs to a json object
Source:
  • all.js, line 586
Returns:
a json representation of the form
Type
object
Example
 
 // captures the field/value set from #myform
 var formData = $('#myform').formToObject();

<static> startsWith() → {object}

finds elements that contain text starting with string
Source:
  • all.js, line 574
Returns:
selection of elements that have text starting with given string
Type
object
Example
 $(':startsWith(text)')
